K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306a-1: a'arya pa ri na ta tsakra na m'a h'a ya n'a s'a tra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306a-3: 'phags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-0: byang chub @306b sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-1: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-2: bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che rdo rje ri'i zom la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rin po che la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-5: gang byang chub sems dpa' chen po don du gnyer bar 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-6: sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'dod cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa 'dzin par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-8: byang chub chen por sems bskyed cing snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rim gro dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-9: bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yangs shing rgya che ba gsog par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-11: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-12: thogs pa med pa'i gzungs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-14: rnam par thar ba'i sgo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-16: mngon par shes pas rnam par rol par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-17: nam mkha' la dbang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-18: mdzod chen po bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-19: rang gi lag nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du gtong zhing 'bul bar 'dod par 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:306b-20: phyogs bcun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-0: sa bcu la rab tu gnas @307a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-1: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-2: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-3: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dag pa'i lam la bde bar gnas pa thob pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-4: deng byang chub tu sems bskyed de bdag gi lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-6: rnam pa thams cad du dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag lus 'bul gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-8: mthu chen po mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-9: sa chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag bzhes su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-11: ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-13: sems kyi rgya bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-14: rab tu zhi zhing dul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-18: yang bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-19: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'khor ba na 'khor zhing bcing ba chen pos bcings par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-21: yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307a-22: nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dbang du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-3: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la rgyab kyi phyogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-5: lam ngan pa la bsnyen pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-6: lam ngan par lhung par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-7: rtag tu bshes gnyen ngan pas zin cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-8: yang dag pa'i lam yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-12: don med pa la rmongs par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-13: dge ba'i chos dang bral zhing mi dge ba chen po bsgrubs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-16: 'phags pa rnams la rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-17: skye rgan 'chi'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing mi bde ba chen po bsgrubs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-20: sems rtag tu g-yengs par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-23: zhi zhing dben par bsgrubs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-24: bag byed pa dang bral bar gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-27: sa bcu'i chos kyi bzod pa la bde bar gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo dang mnyam pa nyid las ring du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-32: btang snyoms tshad med pa bzhi mi sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:307b-33: byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-2: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes chen po las ring du gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-3: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dge ba'i chos sgrub pa las bde bar gnas pa mthob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-6: mi 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-7: yang dag pa'i dran pa la mi gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-8: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid la spyod cing gzhol bar 'jug pa mi sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-9: bsod nams byed pa la g-yel zhing lta ba snyems pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-10: the tshom gyi sgrib pas byang chub kyi yang lag bdun mngon par mi rtogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-11: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-12: nyon mongs pa brgya stong tshad med pas zil gyis non cing sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos sdug bsngal zhing yongs su mnar te rtag tu gdung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-13: bsam pa zhan pas khro zhing rnam par g-yeng ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-14: nyon mongs pa brgya stong la rgyun tu gzhol bar gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-16: byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po la gnas pa rnams kyis bdag gi skyabs mdzad par gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-17: bdag gi rten mdzad par gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-18: bdag gi 'dren pa mdzad par gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-19: bdag myur du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308a-20: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs gsog pa @308b yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-1: bdag myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-7: rnam par grol ba'i yon tan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-11: yang bdag bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-12: mchod pa rgya chen po byed pa'i dus su'ang 'di skad du brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-13: yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po mnga' ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-16: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-17: rim gro chen po bgyis te lus 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-18: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ji snyed rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-19: yo byad bzang po thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-20: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-23: rin po che'i ba dan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-25: rin po che'i dbyig rnam par bkram pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-27: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-28: rin po che'i do shal gyi rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:308b-29: mu tig gi dra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-2: rin po che'i phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-4: rin po che'i gling dag na nor bu rin po che rnam par dag pa'i mar me'i sdong po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-5: rin po che'i dril bu'i sgra 'khrol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-6: gser btso ma'i sbar khab can gyi dom dom pho long dbyangs pas yongs su khebs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-7: gser btso ma'i me tog dzambu'i gser gyi ze ba can gser gyi shing ljon pas dkris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-8: gser gyi pho brang sna tshogs rin po che'i sprin chags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-9: rin po che'i thigs pa char du 'bab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-10: rin po che rnam pa mang po'i mdzod kyi pho brang lha rdzas kyi nor bus rtsigs ngos spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-11: rin po che'i shing thams cad rig 'dzin chen po'i skyed mos tshal gyir ba yid du 'ong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-12: rin po che'i pho brang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-15: nags tshal la sogs pa thams cad kyang yid du 'ong ba de lta bu bdag med pa 'dzin pa med pa thams cad sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-16: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad cad la yongs su bsngo zhing 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-17: dzambu gling na sman bzang po ring du 'tsho bar byed pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-18: nor bu rin po che sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-19: ma g-yos par rang bzhin gyi bda' pa'i zhal zas bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309a-20: spos kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-2: lo ma che zhing me tog rtag par bsung gis gzi bar byed pa'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-3: yid du 'ong ba'i lha rdzas kyi spos yongs su ma bzung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-4: yongs su bzung ba med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-5: dpag bsam gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-6: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas byung ba nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-13: rdo rje'i ri la sogs te rin po che'i rnam pa de dag gi rin po che'i zom sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-15: rdo ba rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-17: rin po che'i pho brang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-19: rin po che'i zhogs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-20: rin po che'i lam srang mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-21: nor bu rin po che'i lam srang mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-22: nor bu rin po che'i ka ba mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-23: rin po che'i sgron ma'i 'khor lo mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-24: bee d'urya la sogs te nor bu'i rigs rnam pa mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-25: ji tsam du lha'i gnas na bdag po med pa'i pho brang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-26: lha'i nor rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong zhing blta bar mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-27: lha'i rol mo'i yo byad rnam pa mang po rlung gi ngad kyis bskyod pa tsam gyis sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:309b-28: nam mkha'i gnas kyi pho brang nas rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-0: @310a *// lha'i rol mo rnam pa mang po ma bskyod par sgra snyan pa rang 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-1: lha'i yo byad sna tshogs nam mkha'i gnas kyi pho brang nas snyan pa'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-2: rin po che'i sprin sna tshogs las snyan pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-3: lha'i nor bu rin po che dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-4: gzhan yang lha'i dri shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-5: me tog gi shing mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-8: bdug pa'i spos kyi shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-12: rin po che'i shing la sogs pa de dag thams cad ma bzung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-13: yongs su bzung ba med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-14: de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'bul lo; ;ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na mchod pa'i sprin chen po me tog gi sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-20: rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-21: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-22: rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-23: rin po che'i gos kyi sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-24: rin po che'i rnam pa'i sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310a-25: rin po che'i phung po'i sprin la sogs te rin po che'i sprin rnam pa de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-0: gzhan yang @310b spos kyi 'bru mar gyis mar me'i snod chen po bkang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-1: stong gi 'jig rten gyi tshad dang mnyam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-2: mar me'i snying bar [?] rab [?] kyi tshad tsam sgron par byas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la mchod cing 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-4: de bzhin du mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i bsod nams dam pa ji tsam pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-5: gang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dge ba mang po brtsams te dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bsod nams de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-6: yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo chen po ni bskor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-7: bdud kyi sde rnams ni pham par byas nas mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par dgongs pa la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-8: bde ba'i phyir bskal pa chen po gcig tshang bar bzhugs par gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:310b-11: sems can thams cad kyis bsod nams ci bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo [?]/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-0: / @311a *// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-2: mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bshags pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang las kyi sgrib pa bshags shing yongs su sbyong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-3: de bzhin du mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-4: bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du dmigs pa'i spyan sngar gsang sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-6: aom sam bha ra sam bha ra bi ma nas ra mah'a dza ba h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-7: gang gsang sngags de bzlas pas ci dag 'dod pa de thams cad 'grub cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-8: lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro; ;rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-10: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing nyin mo'ang rung mtshan mo'ang rung yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo chen po 'di klog cing 'don na de'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'byang zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad khad kyis sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-11: bsod nams kyi tshogs snga ma de dag thams cad thob bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311a-12: lan gcig bklags pa tsam gyis kyang tshangs pa brgya'i dpal dang ldan zhing rmi lam na'ang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311b-0: tshe 'das @311b nas kyang yongs su dag pa'i zhing du skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311b-2: yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-055:311b-3: li'i dge slong sde snod gsum dang ldan pa sh'i la dharmas rgya gar gyi dharma rgya'i yi ge las bande rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur ba'o ////
